actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to restore the right of freedom of choice.

summary.text: Prohibits, except upon the express approval of a majority of the board of education, the assignment or compulsory attendance of any student at any school on account of race, creed, color, or national origin. Prohibits the establishment, reorganization, or maintenance of any school district, school zone, or attendance unit for such purpose. Excepts from the prohibitions imposed by this Act religious and denominational educational institutions.

titles.title: A bill to restore the right of freedom of choice.
